mdRecord.dcterms:title: The works of Oliver Goldsmith / edited by Peter Cunningham
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Cunningham, Peter, 1816-1869
Goldsmith, Oliver, 1730?-1774
mdRecord.dcterms:description: v. 1. Introduction by Austin Dobson. Poetical works. The good-natured man.--v. 2 She stoops to conquer. Scene from the Grumbler. The vicar of Wakefield.--v. 3 An inquiry into the state of polite learning in Europe. The citizen of the world.--v. 4 The citizen of the world.--v. 5 The bee. Essays.--v. 6 Unacknowledged essays. Prefaces, introductions, etc.--v. 8 Biographies. Reviews.--v. 8 Reviews. Letters. Miscellany.
